channel.title: News on Ess Gee Labs
channel.description: Recent content in News on Ess Gee Labs

item.title: First Post
item.description: Welcome I’ve been meaning to put up a website like this for a really long time, but never got around to doing it. While I have by personal and business website, I’ve never put up a technical one. The truth is that even with over two decades of experience, I still feel that what I have to offer is not enough. That whatever I say is going to sound stupid or is not valuable.
